mapper.select: select C.USER_NAME as userName, TO_CHAR(D.MODIFIED_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') AS modifiedDate, D.POST_NO as postNo, D.TITLE from (select A.*, B.CATEGORY_NO as categoryNo from (select b.BLOG_NO as blogNo, a.USER_NAME as userName from blog_user a, blog b where a.USER_NO = b.BLOG_NO) A, CATEGORY B WHERE A.BLOG_NO = B.BLOG_NO AND B.CATEGORY_NO =#{categoryNo }) C, POST D WHERE C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO
